msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).

div.ab: (Col.) 128;;On the 23rd (of Pauni), similarly:;Tepheros, daughter of Heras, through Thermouthis, daughter of Theogeiton - (through) Herakl(--) the porter - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 3 drachmai 5 1/2 obols; for olive (transportation), 3 1/2 obols; for naubion, 2 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme; for eparourion, 2 drachmai 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for kollybos, 1 obol. Total: 8 drachmai 5 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin:) 8 drachmai 10 obols.;Ptolemaios, son of Sambas - (through) Sambas, son of Kiatiab - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 drachmai 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 5 obols; for naubion, 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 3 obols; for eparourion, 4 drachmai; for supplements, 2 obols; for kollybos, 1 1/2 obols. Total: 13 drachmai 1 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. (In left margin:) 12 drachmai 13 obols.;Castrensis, slave of Thaisarion also called Nebsosis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 76;Charmos, son of Heron and Apollonous, grandson of Horos: 8 drachmai; column 78;Petesouchos, son of Heraklas and Stiynchis, grandson of Heraklas: 4 drachmai; column 78;Petaus, son of Petheus and Taseus, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; column 80;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros and Tapetheus, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai 28 obols; column 82;Polis, son of Petheus and Helene, grandson of Keras, for ch(--): 8 drachmai; column 85;Petheus, son of Ptolemaios and Thermouthis, grandson of Petheus, for ch(--): 8 drachmai; column 82;Ninis, son of Asklas and Tabous, grandson of Ninis: 28 obols; column 88;Total for the day: 68 drachmai 21 obols.;;On the 25th, similarly:;Lucius Valerius Primogenes - (through) Nikerion, son of Chairemon - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 5 drachmai 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for olive (transportation), 4 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 3 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme 2 1/2 obols; for eparourion, 3 drachmai 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 2 obols; for kollybos, 1 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 12 drachmai 4 obols 2 chalkoi.;(And) for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 3 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi.
